meanings.definition: The sides of a pavement or sidewalk where vehicles can park.
meanings.sent1: Cars lined up neatly along the kerbsides of the street.
meanings.sent2: Be careful when opening your car door on the kerbsides to avoid hitting passing vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The kerbsides were so full of parked cars that it looked like a car show.
meanings.sent4: The kerbsides of the road were like a welcoming party for the arriving vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow lines on the kerbsides made it easy to see where parking was allowed.

meanings.definition: The edges of a road where pedestrians walk.
meanings.sent1: People strolled leisurely along the kerbsides, enjoying the sunny weather.
meanings.sent2: Always remember to look both ways before crossing the kerbsides.
meanings.sent3: The kerbsides were so crowded with pedestrians that it felt like a busy marketplace.
meanings.sent4: The kerbsides of the road whispered stories of the many footsteps that had passed by.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers planted along the kerbsides added a cheerful touch to the street.
